roleset.name: go up incrementally

role.descr: amount increased by, EXT or MNR

example.name: use arg2
example.text: Some of the free fluid is mildly increased in attenuation

roleset.note: INCREASED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to increase.01. Increase.01 is a member of VN classes other_cos-45.4 and calibratable_cos-45.6-1. Framed by Katie. (from increased.01-j)
Use EXT for numericals only. Otherwise use Arg-2 This is often parsed as a VBN but SHOULD still be annotated in the adjective pass. (from increased.01-j)
